html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-13182024-12-13GAC
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Venezuela) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (VENEZUELA) REGULATIONS in order to (1) allow Canada to impose sanctions in response to the current and continuously deteriorating situation in Venezuela; (2) expand the listing criterion on senior officials of an entity to include both current and former officials; and (3) include updated language for clarification and consistency with other regulations under the Special Economic Measures Act.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0264 Publication Date: 2025-01-01
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (VENEZUELA) REGULATIONS in order to (1) allow Canada to impose sanctions in response to the current and continuously deteriorating situation in Venezuela; (2) expand the listing criterion on senior officials of an entity to include both current and former officials; and (3) include updated language for clarification and consistency with other regulations under the Special Economic Measures Act.
